attributes.action: Decide NOW, on the fate of Iraqi translators that would wish to settle in Britain, and not wait til autumn.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iraqi nationals; translators and others that have helped coalition, and in particular, British forces, have done so at great personal risk. Our debt to those people is huge. We should have the moral fibre to acknowledge our debt and help these people rather than leave them, as we have done in past times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
